ygData.subject: new lead on groflah quest in freeport..
ygData.msgSnippet: as part of the paladin quest for the soulfire sword, groflah appears at a certain tavern in east freeport during early morning hours, around 5 or 6 am
ygData.messageBody:
as part of the paladin quest for the soulfire sword, groflah appears at
"a certain tavern" in east freeport during early morning hours, around 5
or 6 am gametime. i do not know what this "certain tavern" is (and pray
that it is not the seafarer's wharf!) but if this is the case, this MAY
be where groflah needs to be killed to get his note. as you may know,
killing him in north freeport is futile, because he is a merchant.
consequently, groflah may not even appear in east freeport at all unless
somebody has activated his part of the soulfire quest. if so, this would
be an sk quest requiring the assistance of a paladin to carry it off.
very odd....

so folks, keep an eye out in east freeport taverns in early morning game
hours.. and if you see groflah show up, take his dwarven butt out!! and
let the rest of us know what happens :)

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
